name: aizas-fine-art
description: Aiza's Fine Art - Professional art portfolio and e-commerce platform

scripts.dev: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:js && npm run css:watch
scripts.build: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:js && npm run css:build
scripts.build:quick: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:js
scripts.build:full: npm run build && npm run webpack:build:safe
scripts.build:with-fallback: npm run build && (npm run webpack:build:quick || npm run build:fallback)
scripts.build:fallback: echo 'Webpack failed, using manual React bundle' && cp static/dist/js/main.bundle.js.backup static/dist/js/main.bundle.js 2>/dev/null || echo 'No fallback bundle available'
scripts.css:build:safe: timeout 10 tailwindcss --config tailwind.config.minimal.js -i ./static/src/css/input.simple.css -o ./static/dist/css/main.css --minify || cp static/src/css/design-system.css static/dist/css/main.css
scripts.copy:js: mkdir -p static/dist/js && find static/src/js -name '*.js' -not -path '*/react/*' -exec cp {} static/dist/js/ \;
scripts.webpack:build:safe: timeout 300 webpack --mode=production --progress || echo 'Webpack build timed out after 5 minutes'
scripts.test:build: npm run build:quick && echo 'Basic build completed successfully'

author: Aiza
